title: GET api/v1/devicetypes/{deviceTypeId} RESPONSE
description: JSON document describing the device type

id.description: Id of the device type. Consists of id of manufacturer followed by id of device type. See documentation for rules.

version.description: Version number of the template. Minor version must be increased with every change. Major version must only be changed when targeting a different API version.

name.description: Name of the device as given by manufacturer

manufacturerId.description: Id of the manufacturer of the device type.

manufacturerNameShort.description: Abbreviated version of the name of the manufacturer

orderCode.description: Order code for the device type as used by the manufacturer.

orderNumber.description: Order number for the device type as used by the manufacturer.

climateLoad.description: The maximum heat dissipation of the device type.

portTypes.description: List of all types of ports on the device type.

name.description: Name of the port, as printed on the device.

direction.description: Direction of the port type. See documentation for explainations of the possible values.

compatibleSignalTypes.description: List of signal types that are compatible with this port.

moduleSlotTypes.description: List of all types of module slots on the device type.

id.description: Id of the module slot type

name.description: Name of the module slot, as labeled on the device.
